description.en: iM Intelligent Mining (iM) is changing the fabric of blockchain mining by developing a system where truly decentralized mining is accessible through its clean-tech mining solutions. iM is focused on ensuring the blockchain is secure and decentralized while the environment is protected as global adoption for digital assets grows, and as a result, global energy consumption increases. Token holders can be a part of iM’s operation by holding its iM utility token, focused on liquidity, staking, and governance. Additionally, iM token holders can earn iM+ tokens that can be swapped for iM’s fully verifiable and sustainably sourced green digital assets.
